register.title: zz Sign up and receive a free class!

promos.p_one: zz Fluency in a language comes with dedicated effort and confidence. Our individual training will allow you to feel comfortable and confident while progressing in life and total comprehension of your target language.
promos.p_two: zz Our goal is your immediate success in learning your target language, but also success and satisfaction throughout your entire life.
promos.p_three: zz You will have opportunity to connect with people from different countries, cultures, and walks of life. You will make connections that will change your life!

para_one.title: zz Classroom Locations
para_one.sub_one: zz Personalized Help Just for Your Needs!
para_one.sub_two: zz Always Find Time to Improve Yourself!
para_one.sub_three: zz Make New Friends, and Gain Confidence!
para_one.sub_four: zz Achieve Fluency Quickly, Acomplish More Daily!

para_two.sub_one: zz Select class times that work for you!
para_two.sub_three: zz Design custom lessons that will always be interesting!
